title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

anyOf.title: The Booking Header Response schema
anyOf.description: Includes the information requested in a booking, service terms and types as well as the assigned booking reference by the carrier.

carrierBookingRequestReference.description: A reference to the booking during the booking request phase.

documentStatus.description: The status of the document in the process.

bookingRequestDateTime.description: The date and time of the booking request.

receiptTypeAtOrigin.description: Indicates the type of service offered at Origin. Options are defined in the Receipt/Delivery entity.

deliveryTypeAtDestination.description: Indicates the type of service offered at Destination. Options are defined in the Receipt/Delivery entity.

cargoMovementTypeAtOrigin.description: Refers to the shipment term at the loading of the cargo out of the container. Options are defined in the Cargo Movement Type entity.

cargoMovementTypeAtDestination.description: Refers to the shipment term at the unloading of the cargo out of the container. Options are defined in the Cargo Movement Type entity.

serviceContractReference.description: Reference number for agreement between shipper and carrier through which the shipper commits to provide a certain minimum quantity of cargo over a fixed period, and the carrier commits to a certain rate or rate schedule.

paymentTermCode.description: Indicates whether freight & charges are due for payment before the shipment is effected, practically before the transport document is released to shipper (Prepaid) or before the shipment is finalized meaning cargo released to consignee (Collect)

exportDeclarationReference.description: A government document permitting designated goods to be shipped out of the country. Reference number assigned by an issuing authority to an Export License. The export license must be valid at time of departure. Required if Export declaration required is ‘True’.

importLicenseReference.description: A certificate, issued by countries exercising import controls, that permits importation of the articles stated in the license. Reference number assigned by an issuing authority to an Import License. The import license number must be valid at time of arrival. Required if import license required is ‘True’.

submissionDateTime.description: Date and time of submitting the relevant document and attributes

isAMSACIFilingRequired.description: Customs filing for US (AMS) or Canadian (ACI) customs

isDestinationFilingRequired.description: Indicates whether the shipper will perform the AMS/ACI filing directly or not. Mandatory if AMS/ACI filing is required

contractQuotationReference.description: Information provided by the shipper to identify whether pricing for the shipment has been agreed via a contract or a quotation reference. Mandatory if service contract (owner) is not provided.

expectedDepartureDate.description: The date when the shipment is expected to be loaded on board a vessel as provided by the shipper or its agent. If vessel/voyage or expected date of arrival is not provided, this is mandatory.

transportDocumentTypeCode.description: Specifies the type of the transport document

transportDocumentReference.description: A unique number allocated by the shipping line to the transport document and the main number used for the tracking of the status of the shipment

bookingChannelReference.description: Identification number provided by the platform/channel used for booking request/confirmation, ex: Inttra booking reference, or GTNexus, other. Conditional on booking channel being used

incoTerms.description: Transport obligations, costs and risks as agreed between buyer and seller.

communicationChannel.description: Specifying which communication channel is to be used for this booking.

isEquipmentSubstitutionAllowed.description: Indicates if an alternate equipment type can be provided by the carrier.

vesselName.description: The name of the Vessel given by the Vessel Operator and registered with IMO.

vesselIMONumber.description: The unique reference for a registered Vessel. The reference is the International Maritime Organisation (IMO) number, also sometimes known as the Lloyd's register code, which does not change during the lifetime of the vessel.

carrierVoyageNumber.description: The vessel operator-specific identifier of the Voyage.

preCarriageFromModeOfTransport.description: The mode of transport performed by the shipper for preCarriage as defined by DCSA.

onCarriageToModeOfTransport.description: The mode of transport performed by the shipper for onCarriage as defined by DCSA.

commodityType.description: High-level description of goods to be shipped which allow the carrier to confirm acceptance and commercial terms. To be replaced by "description of goods" upon submission of shipping instruction
commodityType.title: The commodityType schema

HSCode.description: Used by customs to classify the product being shipped.
HSCode.title: The HSCode schema

cargoGrossWeight.description: The grand total weight of the cargo and weight per container(s) including packaging items being carried, which can be expressed in imperial or metric terms, as provided by the shipper. Excludes the tare weight of the container(s).
cargoGrossWeight.title: The cargoGrossWeight schema

cargoGrossWeightUnit.description: The unit of measure which can be expressed in imperial or metric terms.

exportLicenseIssueDate.description: Issue date of the export license applicable to the booking. Mandatory to provide in booking request for specific commodities
exportLicenseIssueDate.title: The exportLicenseIssueDate schema

exportLicenseExpiryDate.description: Expiry date of the export license applicable to the booking. Mandatory to provide in booking request for specific commodities.
exportLicenseExpiryDate.title: The exportLicenseExpiryDate schema

valueAddedServiceCode.description: Code of the value added service.
valueAddedServiceCode.title: The valueAddedServiceRequests schema

valueAddedServiceCode.description: The reference type codes defined by DCSA.
valueAddedServiceCode.title: The referenceType schema

referenceValue.description: The actual value of the reference.
referenceValue.title: The referenceValue schema

requestedEquipmentSizeType.description: Unique code for the different equipment size/type used for transporting commodities. The code is a concatenation of ISO Equipment Size Code and ISO Equipment Type Code A and follows the ISO 6346 standard.
requestedEquipmentSizeType.title: The requestedEquipmentSizeType schema

isShipperOwned.description: Indicates whether the container is shipper owned (SOC).
isShipperOwned.title: The isShipperOwned schema

partyFunction.description: Unique code for the different equipment size/type used for transporting commodities. The code is a concatenation of ISO Equipment Size Code and ISO Equipment Type Code A and follows the ISO 6346 standard.
partyFunction.title: The requestedEquipmentSizeType schema

isToBeNotified.description: Indicates whether the container is shipper owned (SOC).
isToBeNotified.title: The isToBeNotified schema
